file_content.text: The ruins are a little more manageable thanks to you, Padawan.
The horranth matriarchs and patriarchs make a distinctive howl when they mate, and when they die. Heard it echoing throughout the ruins.
I've marked fewer of the beasts bounding through the area already. You have my gratitude.
Their nests were everywhere--"were" being the operative word.
I found a lot of eggs, too.
Happy to help.
You're welcome.
It's Jedi like you that make me proud to serve.
It's prospects like you that make me so proud to serve.
We must be free to study and search the ruins for secrets of the Force.
This area is important to us.
You've ensured that will continue to be possible.
If we can't maintain order in our own backyard, what hope does the galaxy have?
This area is important to us.
You do have a point.
Your plight here is inconsequential. I did it for my fellow Jedi.
Didn't do it for you.
Then I guess I'm just a lucky guy.
Be well.
The beasts are getting bolder by the hour. Sure hope you're able to eliminate a horranth matriarch and patriarch soon.
Rotten, procreating beasts! Padawans will start dying if this keeps up.
Oh, at least you made it through, Jedi. The horranths are everywhere lately. Hulking, razor-mawed monsters with nasty dispositions.
Oh, Padawan, at least you made it through. The horranths are everywhere lately. Hulking, razor-mawed monsters with nasty dispositions.
They're multiplying fast and growing bolder. Something in the water since the Flesh Raiders came... I could use help getting things under control.
The situation seems pretty serious.
Sounds important.
Not sure how much longer we can keep this camp from being overrun.
Who are you, anyway?
And you are?
Not the first time I've been accused of being rude. Sorry. I'm Sedni Maruk.
Trained here myself. The Masters decided my talents were best served guarding and protecting the ruins.
I'm proud to serve. Wanted to be a Jedi, but this is the next best thing. Until now.
It's not an indictment of you. Not everyone is cut out for this life.
No shame in that.
I tell myself that every day.
You mean, you weren't cut out to be a Jedi.
So you failed.
I suppose that is the blunt truth of it. But at least I'm helping out however I can.
What can I do to help?
Tell me what's needed.
Get to the point.
Eliminating a horranth matriarch and patriarch will slow the beasts' population explosion. But they're tough to find and even tougher to kill.
The matriarchs and patriarchs tend to gravitate in different clearings. You'll have to hunt them down separately--if you're willing to help?
Absolutely.
Relieved to hear it.
While you're out there, removing any of the beasts' eggs you spot would help, too. It's up to you.
I'll do it, but we have to find a better solution for the future, so senseless slaughter isn't our only recourse.
I'm not happy about this.
Agreed, but right now our options are limited. Would really help if you remove any of the beasts' eggs you see. But it's up to you.
Hope you fare well. I'll be here, holding down the camp.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Well, great. Change your mind, I'll be here. Maybe not in one piece, but here.
Protecting the ruins and this camp is getting to be a full-time job.
